code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{BrowserRouter,Route,Routes}from'react-router-dom';import Login from'./pages/login';import Home from'./pages/Home';import Register from'./pages/Register';import Nav from'./components/Nav';import axios from'axios';import Forgot from'./pages/Forgot';import Reset from'./pages/Reset';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[login,setLogin]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{(async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('user');const user=response.data;console.log(response);setUser(user);}catch(e){setUser(null);}})();},[login]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(BrowserRouter,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav,{user:user,setLogin:()=>setLogin(false)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{setLogin:()=>setLogin(true)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/register",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Register,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/forgot",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Forgot,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/reset/:token",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Reset,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{user:user})})]})]})});}export default App;
